syllabus:
**Course Description:**

This course aims to prepare students for a basic concept and overview of how business works. Topics include business organization, marketing, business ethics, culture, and social responsibility. Relevant terminologies and grammar will be introduced and practiced in each lesson. Students are expected to use four skills to participate in a variety of activities, including the discussion of relevant issues or oral report of relevant case studies. In the end of this course, students will be asked to work on a group proposal, using clear and concise language to present an innovative marketing proposal.
